metadata.name: Topic::Batch
metadata.description: Batch object used to publish multiple messages at once.

metadata.name: Batch::publish
metadata.description: Add multiple messages to the topic. All messages added will be published at once. See {Gcloud::Pubsub::Topic#publish}

metadata.name: Batch::jsonify_hash
metadata.description: Make the hash look like it was returned from the Cloud API.
